description.english: The crude mercenary tag made by aluminium that every newbie mercenary is given one for identification.
description.schinese: 加入佣兵团时颁发给新人的简易铝制狗牌，上头刻有等级，低等佣兵受命服从高等佣兵，但主要是在识别尸体时使用。
description.tchinese: 加入傭兵團時頒發給新人的簡易鋁製狗牌，上頭刻有等級，低等傭兵受命服從高等傭兵，但主要是在識別屍體時使用。

description.english: A handmade decoration that is given to a newbie worrier after the Skydow novice training.
description.schinese: 完成了天影新手教学后所获得的手工装饰品，代表你的潜能尚未开眼，是接受正式训练前的必经过程。
description.tchinese: 完成了天影新手教學後所獲得的手工裝飾品，代表你的潛能尚未開眼，是接受正式訓練前的必經過程。

description.english: The Royal temporary pass issued to soldiers who pass the recruit training.
description.schinese: 帝国颁发给准备进行军事训练的新兵使用的临时通行证，上头标示着1663号军事训练区的位置。
description.tchinese: 帝國頒發給準備進行軍事訓練的新兵使用的臨時通行證，上頭標示著1663號軍事訓練區的位置。

description.english: An iron Mercenary Tag awarded from Rick, the ninth of The Third Force. Only the ones who own this tag is qualified to accept missions from The Third Force.
description.schinese: 由佣兵团九手-瑞克所颁发的铁制狗牌，拥有它才能接受佣兵团的任务委托。不少佣兵拿到狗牌后将之熔为铁块并退出佣兵团，毕竟废铁在乱世中的卖价也是挺高的。
description.tchinese: 由傭兵團九手-瑞克所頒發的鐵製狗牌，擁有它才能接受傭兵團的任務委託。 不少傭兵拿到狗牌後將之熔為鐵塊並退出傭兵團，畢竟廢鐵在亂世中的賣價也是挺高的。

description.english: The badge represents the honour and the will to serve the army of Royal Empire.
description.schinese: 身为帝国正规军皆需要配戴的标章，以示帝国团结一致与坚不可摧的意志，不过要获得这份殊荣也要有必死的决心。
description.tchinese: 身為帝國正規軍皆需要配戴的標章，以示帝國團結一致與堅不可摧的意志，不過要獲得這份殊榮也要有必死的決心。

description.english: A mark that symbolises the eyes of Skydow opened.
description.schinese: 将
description.tchinese: 將"鷹眼"圖樣縫製在衣物角落，象徵你的天影之氣已獲得解放，靈魂之窗重見光明，如同老鷹般的五感能助你避開危險獵殺敵人。

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 3
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成3个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成3個關卡

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 6
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成6个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成6個關卡

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 9
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成9个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成9個關卡

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 12
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成12个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成12個關卡

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 15
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成15个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成15個關卡

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 18
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成18个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成18個關卡

description.english: Complete a mission with minimum players x 21
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成21个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成21個關卡

description.english: The C-level mission merit obtained by successfully assassinating the Duke Droo can be used to exchange for a year of food and clothing and a promotion in rank.
description.schinese: 刺杀多伦大公成功所获得的C级任务功勋。凭借此功勋可向佣兵团换取一年份的衣食物资与位阶的提升。至于你对于暗杀多伦大公背后原因的好奇，佣兵团一贯表示低等佣兵只要奉命行事，不得过问。
description.tchinese: 刺殺多倫大公成功所獲得的C級任務功勳。憑藉此功勳可向傭兵團換取一年份的衣食物資與位階的提升。 至於你對於暗殺多倫大公背後原因的好奇，傭兵團一貫表示低等傭兵只要奉命行事，不得過問。

description.english: The Elmar Village gave the rice as a gift to thank you for pacifying the thieves. The grains of rice contain the gratitude of the villagers.
description.schinese: 艾尔玛村民为了感谢天影平复盗贼的侵害所赠送的稻米。米粒中蕴含着村民们的感激之心。
description.tchinese: 艾爾瑪村民為了感謝天影平復盜賊的侵害所贈送的稻米。米粒中蘊含著村民們的感激之心。

description.english: For sticking to the city of Arthas, the Lord of Arthas has awarded you the metal. This metal can be used to request a wish from the City Lord.
description.schinese: 阿萨斯城主为了感谢你坚守阿萨斯城，所颁发的功勋。凭此功勋可向城主请领一个愿望。
description.tchinese: 阿薩斯城主為了感謝你堅守阿薩斯城，所頒發的功勳。憑此功勳可向城主請領一個願望。

description.english: For annihilating the intruders in the city of Arthas, the Lord of Arthas has awarded you the metal. This metal can be used to request a wish from the City Lord.
description.schinese: 阿萨斯城主为了感谢你歼灭包围阿萨斯城的天影，所颁发的功勋。凭此功勋可向城主请领一个愿望。
description.tchinese: 阿薩斯城主為了感謝你殲滅包圍阿薩斯城的天影，所頒發的功勳。憑此功勳可向城主請領一個願望。

description.english: A record of killing more than ten worriors in Twilight Wars.
description.schinese: 在光晕战记中斩杀十人以上的记录。
description.tchinese: 在光暈戰記中斬殺十人以上的記錄。

description.english: A record of killing more than a hundred of worriors in Twilight Wars.
description.schinese: 在光晕战记中斩杀一百人以上的记录。
description.tchinese: 在光暈戰記中斬殺一百人以上的記錄。

description.english: A record of killing more than a thousand of worriors in Twilight Wars.
description.schinese: 在光晕战记中斩杀一千人以上的记录。
description.tchinese: 在光暈戰記中斬殺一千人以上的記錄。

description.english: A record of killing more than ten thousands of worriors in Twilight Wars.
description.schinese: 在光晕战记中斩杀一万人以上的记录。
description.tchinese: 在光暈戰記中斬殺一萬人以上的記錄。

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 24 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成24个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成24個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 27 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成27个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成27個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 30 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成30个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成30個關卡

description.english: The designer glasses that I got during the EBO mission. Although it had been broken. Seeing these glasses seems to make me feel uneasy from the bottom of my heart...
description.schinese: 在EBO分部进行任务时得到的名贵眼镜。镜片现已破碎，看到它就有一股不安的感觉从心底窜出。
description.tchinese: 在EBO分部進行任務時得到的名貴眼鏡。鏡片現已破碎，看到它就有一股不安的感覺從心底竄出。

description.english: The medical kit that Dr. Edith often uses on the road. It is said that the therapeutic effect can be significantly enhanced when used together with pearl powder.
description.schinese: 伊蒂丝博士在路上常常使用的医疗包。据说与珍珠粉混用能让治疗效果显著增加，但未经科学方法实证。
description.tchinese: 伊蒂絲博士在路上常常使用的醫療包。據說與珍珠粉混用能讓治療效果顯著增加，但未經科學方法實證。

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 33 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成33个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成33個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 36 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成36个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成36個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 39 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成39个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成39個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 42 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成42个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成42個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 45 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成45个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成45個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 48 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成48个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成48個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 51 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成51个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成51個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 54 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成54个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成54個關卡

description.english: The blood on my body had frozen into blood-red snowflakes. This is ironclad evidence of victory and a scar that will never fade.
description.schinese: 流淌的鲜血冻结成红色的雪花，这是胜利的铁证，亦是永不褪色的伤痕。
description.tchinese: 流淌的鮮血凍結成紅色的雪花，這是勝利的鐵證，亦是永不褪色的傷痕。

description.english: Joined a multiplayer battle with self-designed character and won.
description.schinese: 以自创角色加入一场多人对战，并成功取得胜利。
description.tchinese: 以自創角色加入一場多人對戰，並成功取得勝利。

description.english: Successfully surpassed the most difficult Arena (single player practice mode).
description.schinese: 成功超越最高难度的对战模拟（单人练习）。
description.tchinese: 成功超越最高難度的對戰模擬（單人練習）。

description.english: Successfully surpassed the most difficult Survival (single player practice mode).
description.schinese: 成功超越最高难度的生存模式（单人练习）。
description.tchinese: 成功超越最高難度的生存模式（單人練習）。

description.english: Successfully surpassed the most difficult Slaughter (single player practice mode).
description.schinese: 成功超越最高难度的杀戮战场（单人练习）。
description.tchinese: 成功超越最高難度的殺戮戰場（單人練習）。

description.english: Successfully surpassed the most difficult Flag (single player practice mode).
description.schinese: 成功超越最高难度的抢旗模式（单人练习）。
description.tchinese: 成功超越最高難度的搶旗模式（單人練習）。

description.english: Successfully surpassed the most difficult Zombies (single player practice mode).
description.schinese: 成功超越最高难度的僵尸来袭（单人练习）。
description.tchinese: 成功超越最高難度的殭屍來襲（單人練習）。

description.english: The mysterious ore is extremely hard and does not feel hot at all when held in the hand. According to the Irama people, five crystals together have the ability to change the world.
description.schinese: 神秘的未知矿石，坚硬异常，其色如火，拿着却丝毫不觉烫手。依据伊拉马的说法，五块晶石凑在一起即有使天地产生异变的力量。
description.tchinese: 神秘的未知礦石，堅硬異常，其色如火，拿著卻絲毫不覺燙手。依據伊拉馬的說法，五塊晶石湊在一起即有使天地產生異變的力量。

description.english: The cipher text telegrams recovered from the escaping mercenaries seemed to be messages from within the Merc. instructing them to evacuate. As for why they had to evacuate from the rainforest, it stayed known from the cipher text.
description.schinese: 从逃离的佣兵身上搜刮出来的密文电报，似乎是佣兵团内部指示撤离的讯息，至于为何必须撤离出雨林，仍无法从密文中解出。
description.tchinese: 從逃離的傭兵身上搜刮出來的密文電報，似乎是傭兵團內部指示撤離的訊息，至於為何必須撤離出雨林，仍無法從密文中解出。

displayName.english: Secret Notes on Beauty and Beauty

description.english: The recipe to make special lotion to keep skin smooth and wrinkle-free. Gina seems to like it very much!
description.schinese: 详述制作特制乳液的特殊配方。这款特制乳液一抹即能长时保持皮肤滋润滑顺，从肌底预防细纹、淡化皱纹，似乎很受吉娜喜爱!
description.tchinese: 詳述製作特製乳液的特殊配方。這款特製乳液一抹即能長時保持皮膚滋潤滑順，從肌底預防細紋、淡化皺紋，似乎很受吉娜喜愛!

description.english: The Black Fatwa-VII carried by the mercenaries. Obtaining your head will earn you heavy rewards from Merc. the 7th Hand, and a promotion in rank will follow. Since the founding of the Merc., almost no prey on the black fatwa has been able to escape!
description.schinese:
佣兵们携带着的黑色追杀指令-VII，只要取得你的项上人头，就能获得七手重赏，并提高在佣兵团内的级职。
自佣兵团创立以来，黑色追杀令所划上的猎物几乎没一个能逃得掉!
description.tchinese:
傭兵們攜帶著的黑色追殺指令-VII，只要取得你的項上人頭，就能獲得七手重賞，並提高在傭兵團內的級職。
自傭兵團創立以來，黑色追殺令所劃上的獵物幾乎沒一個能逃得掉!

description.english: Wear this accessory to participate in Skydow's gathering. *Skydow Reputation +10
description.schinese: 配载此配饰即可参加天影的一般集会。 *天影声望+10
description.tchinese: 配載此配飾即可參加天影的一般集會。 *天影聲望+10

description.english: The issuance of this pass is based on the trust of the Royal Knights in you. *Royal Reputation +10
description.schinese: 此通行证的核发是建立在皇家骑士团对你的信任上。 *帝国声望+10
description.tchinese: 此通行證的核發是建立在皇家騎士團對你的信任上。 *帝國聲望+10

description.english: Your martial arts and strength have potential that deserves to be developed. *Third force reputation +10
description.schinese: 你的武术与力量有值得被开发的潜力。 *第三势力声望+10
description.tchinese: 你的武術與力量有值得被開發的潛力。 *第三勢力聲望+10

description.english: This mark carves a historical trace of your dedication to the Skydow Crusade. *Skydow Reputation +50
description.schinese: 此印记刻下你为天影十字军奉献的历史痕迹。 *天影声望+50
description.tchinese: 此印記刻下你為天影十字軍奉獻的歷史痕跡。 *天影聲望+50

description.english: This badge symbolizes your indelible service to the Royal Order. *Royal Reputation +50
description.schinese: 此枚徽章象征你对皇家骑士团无可抹灭的功勋。 *帝国声望+50
description.tchinese: 此枚徽章象徵你對皇家騎士團無可抹滅的功勳。 *帝國聲望+50

description.english: Your martial arts and strength are recognized by the Third Force. *Third force reputation +50
description.schinese: 你的武术与力量受到第三方势力的肯定。 *第三势力声望+50
description.tchinese: 你的武術與力量受到第三方勢力的肯定。 *第三勢力聲望+50

description.english: Having the Skydow Dragon tattooed on the body is the most noble symbol among the Skydow Warriors, which means that the blood flowing through your veins has become one with Earth. *Skydow Reputation +100
description.schinese: 身上刺有天影龙纹是天影武士中最高贵的象征，意味着身上的血脉已与天地合而为一。 *天影声望+100
description.tchinese: 身上刺有天影龍紋是天影武士中最高貴的象徵，意味著身上的血脈已與天地合而為一。 *天影聲望+100

description.english: The Royal Seal represents the highest honor of the Royal Knights, and the Royal Army can be mobilized by showing this Royal Seal. *Empire Reputation +100
description.schinese: 皇家御玺代表了皇家骑士团的最高荣誉，出示此御玺即有可调动皇家军队的尊贵权势。 *帝国声望+100
description.tchinese: 皇家御璽代表了皇家騎士團的最高榮譽，出示此御璽即有可調動皇家軍隊的尊貴權勢。 *帝國聲望+100

description.english: Your martial arts and strength are so powerful that you have the title of Mercenary King. *Third force reputation +100
description.schinese: 你的武术与力量过于强大而有佣兵王的称号。 *第三势力声望+100
description.tchinese: 你的武術與力量過於強大而有傭兵王的稱號。 *第三勢力聲望+100

description.english: A volume of recording materials found in the abandoned Bluestar research room. The researchers stationed there at the time recorded the sounds of the jungle on Bluestar. It is very helpful for studying the behavior of animals on the island!
description.schinese: 一卷于废弃的蓝星岛研究室内找到的录音材料，是当时驻扎此处的研究员们所录下的蓝星丛林之声，对于研究蓝星岛动物的行为很有帮助!
description.tchinese: 一卷於廢棄的藍星島研究室內找到的錄音材料，是當時駐紮此處的研究員們所錄下的藍星叢林之聲，對於研究藍星島動物的行為很有幫助!

description.english: A letter obtained from a member of Skyden, which records a location hidden in a forest road covered by clouds and mist, as well as the secret of the implementation of "Eyes of Skyden". Only by practicing Eyes of Skyden there can you see the secret passage leading to Skyden realm.
description.schinese: 从天隐族人取得的书信，上面记载一处藏匿于云雾覆盖的山中林道，并绘有天隐之眼的施行体术。按书信指示的隐匿处打开天隐之眼，方能看见通往天隐秘境的通道!
description.tchinese: 從天隱族人取得的書信，上面記載一處藏匿於雲霧覆蓋的山中林道，並繪有天隱之眼的施行體術。 按書信指示的隱匿處打開天隱之眼，方能看見通往天隱秘境的通道!

description.english: A soul spirit is a puppet created by Mazshita who secretly absorbs the vitality of the object when he is unconscious. The eyes are lifeless and bloodless, but they have the same appearance as the object being absorbed. After being scattered, they will return to their original shape after a while. Although not strong individually, a soul spirit is quite useful as a subordinate!
description.schinese: 精魂气魄乃是马兹席塔实行秘术时，于对象失去意识时偷偷吸取生气所制造的魁儡。两眼无神，毫无血色，却有着与被吸取对象相同的容貌，被打散后过段时间便会恢复原状。虽然个体并不强大，但是作为手下使唤却相当有用!
description.tchinese: 精魂氣魄乃是馬茲席塔實行秘術時，於對象失去意識時偷偷吸取生氣所製造的魁儡。兩眼無神，毫無血色，卻有著與被吸取對象相同的容貌，被打散後過段時間便會恢復原狀。雖然個體並不強大，但是作為手下使喚卻相當有用!

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 57 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成57个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成57個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 60 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成60个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成60個關卡

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 63 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成63个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成63個關卡

description.english: An ancient secret book that records how to integrate the five-element relic into the body and cast powerful elemental magic. The book also explains the checks and balances between the elements in the body after the spell is cast.
description.schinese: 记载如何将五元舍利融进体内，施展强大元素奥法的古老秘笈。书中也记载着施法者在术后体内元素间的生克关系。
description.tchinese: 記載如何將五元舍利融進體內，施展強大元素奧法的古老秘笈。 書中也記載著施法者在術後體內元素間的生剋關係。

description.english: The key to the Fengyue Pagoda's door was originally worth a lot on the black market. However, after the pagoda was invaded, the empire had used a different door locking mechanism, so the value of the key had plummeted, and it no longer had much use in the eyes of people who didn't know its true purpose.
description.schinese: 风月宝塔的大门钥匙，原本在黑市价值连城。自宝塔被入侵后，帝国已采用新的锁门机关，导至风月钥匙的价值一落千丈。在不知此钥真正用途的一般人眼中，这把钥匙已无多大用处。
description.tchinese: 風月寶塔的大門鑰匙，原本在黑市價值連城。自寶塔被入侵後，帝國已採用新的鎖門機關，導至風月鑰匙的價值一落千丈。在不知此鑰真正用途的一般人眼中，這把鑰匙已無多大用處。

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 66 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成66个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成66個關卡

description.english: The chessboard picked up in the Black Flame military camp was designed after the board games of an ancient country in the east. It has magnetic properties and was used by the General in military formation rehearsals. The black pieces currently arranged on the chessboard is facing the overwhelming advantage of the white pieces. It seems that black will lose, but in fact there is a turning point.
description.schinese:
在黑炎军营内捡到的棋盘。仿照远古东方大国的棋盘游戏所设计，拥有吸磁的特性，被黑炎大将用于军事布阵演示之途。
这棋盘上最后排布的黑子对上拥有压倒性优势的白子，看似必败，实则暗藏玄机。
description.tchinese: 在黑炎軍營內撿到的棋盤。仿照遠古東方大國的棋盤遊戲所設計，擁有吸磁的特性，被黑炎大將用於軍事布陣演示之途。這棋盤上最後排布的黑子對上擁有壓倒性優勢的白子，看似必敗，實則暗藏玄機。

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 69 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成69个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成69個關卡

description.english: Encountered "Earth Fissure" in the battle, successfully killed the Event Boss and won the final victory in the battle.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「地裂」，成功击杀事件魔王并取得该战斗的最后胜利。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「地裂」，成功擊殺事件魔王並取得該戰鬥的最後勝利。

description.english: Encountered "Swarm" in the battle, successfully cooperated with comrades to killed the Event Boss and won the final victory in the battle.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「蜂潮」，成功与战友合作击杀事件魔王并取得该战斗的最后胜利。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「蜂潮」，成功與戰友合作擊殺事件魔王並取得該戰鬥的最後勝利。

description.english: Encountered "Zombie" in the battle, successfully killed the Event Boss and won the final victory in the battle.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「尸变」，成功击杀事件魔王并取得该战斗的最后胜利。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「屍變」，成功擊殺事件魔王並取得該戰鬥的最後勝利。

description.english: Encountered a "Treasure Hunt" event during the battle, successfully captured the dug treasure and won the final victory in the battle.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「挖宝」事件，成功夺得挖出的宝物并取得该战斗的最后胜利。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「挖寶」事件，成功奪得挖出的寶物並取得該戰鬥的最後勝利。

description.english: Encountered a "Robbery" incident during the battle, successfully rescued the beauty, defeated the devil, and won the final victory in the battle.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「劫色」事件，成功解救美女打败魔王并取得该战斗的最后胜利。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「劫色」事件，成功解救美女打敗魔王並取得該戰鬥的最後勝利。

description.english: Encountered a "Robbery" incident during the battle, saw the woman being humiliated, and did not help, resulting in the woman being kidnapped. The path to clear your notoriety: encounter another "Robbery" incident, and eliminate at least one gangster before the woman is kidnapped or dies.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「劫色」事件，见女受辱未拔刀相助致使女子被掳。  洗刷恶名的路径：再次遭遇「劫色」事件，在女子被掳走或死亡前解决至少一位劫色歹徒。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「劫色」事件，見女受辱未拔刀相助致使女子被擄。 洗刷惡名的路徑：再次遭遇「劫色」事件，在女子被擄走或死亡前解決至少一位劫色歹徒。

description.english: Encountered "Flooding" event during the battle, successfully killed all the piranhas and won the final victory in the battle.
description.schinese: 在战斗中遭遇「洪水」，成功击杀所有食人鱼并取得该战斗的最后胜利。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中遭遇「洪水」，成功擊殺所有食人魚並取得該戰鬥的最後勝利。

description.english: During the battle at Thor's Gate, some seeds of the Black Flame Flower were discovered adhering to the body. The Black Flame Master can cause the seeds to bloom and move freely between the stamens of the Black Flame Flower everywhere.
description.schinese: 于索尔之门一战中发现黏附于身上的黑炎花的种子。黑炎剑的灵剑使可以促使种子开花，并在世界各处的黑炎花花蕊中穿梭自如。
description.tchinese: 於索爾之門一戰中發現黏附於身上的黑炎花的種子。 黑炎劍的靈劍使可以促使種子開花，並在世界各處的黑炎花花蕊中穿梭自如。

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 72 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成72个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成72個關卡

displayName.english: The Finger of the Skull King

description.english: During the guarding of the Soul-Severing Ritual, an unusually ferocious zombie was encountered. From its belly was retrieved an abnormally large severed pinky finger, with exposed bone at the tip and the rest covered in shriveled, dark-purple flesh. It is said that buried within the ancient battlefield of Changping lies an old temple that once enshrined a giant skeleton. This severed finger may have originated from that very temple.
description.schinese: 护法断魂术的期间，遭遇一具特别凶猛的僵尸，由其腹中取出一截长度异于常人的巨大小指，末端有白骨露出，其余部分仍有干瘪的暗紫色皮肉覆盖。 据传长平古战场埋有一座古庙，旧时供奉一付巨型骷髅，也许这根断指原出此庙也未可知。
description.tchinese: 護法斷魂術的期間，遭遇一具特別兇猛的殭屍，由其腹中取出一截長度異於常人的巨大小指，末端有白骨露出，其餘部分仍有乾癟的暗紫色皮肉覆蓋。 據傳長平古戰場埋有一座古廟，舊時供奉一付巨型骷髏，也許這根斷指原出此廟也未可知。

description.english: Challenge the mission limit with the lowest number of people: Complete 75 levels
description.schinese: 以最低人数挑战任务极限：完成75个关卡
description.tchinese: 以最低人數挑戰任務極限：完成75個關卡
